title: Alfa Romeo - Wikipedia
snippet: By 1986, IRI was suffering heavy losses—with Alfa Romeo having not been profitable for the last 13 years—and IRI president Romano Prodi put Alfa Romeo up for sale. Finmeccanica, the mechanical holdings arm of IRI and its predecessors owned Alfa Romeo since 1932.

title: Who owns Alfa Romeo? | Alfa Romeo History | Genesis Alfa Romeo
snippet: When you see the stylish Giulia or Stelvio cruising on the streets around Grosse Pointe, you may start to wonder, “who owns Alfa Romeo?” Alfa Romeo has been owned by Fiat-Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) since 2007.

title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo? | Where is Alfa Romeo Made?
snippet: Alfa Romeo has been owned by Fiat-Chrysler Automobile (FCA) since 2007. Learn more about this luxury brand, then stop by our Merriam dealership to find the model better suited for your needs.

title: Is Alfa Romeo Part of Stellantis? | Benson Alfa Romeo
snippet: Since 2007, Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) owned Alfa Romeo.
